sentence.Network_en: I honestly thought I'd seen the last of you.
sentence.Network_cn: 老实说我以为再也不用见到你了。

sentence.Network_en: It's important to answer her questions as honestly as you can.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽可能如实回答她的问题非常重要。

sentence.Network_en: She fought honestly for a just cause and for freedom.
sentence.Network_cn: 她为了正义的事业和自由而光明正大地斗争。

It ' s really delicious , but I honestly couldn ' t eat any more ., 这味道的确很好 , 不过我实在一点也吃不下去了.

entry.def: You use honestly to emphasize that you are referring to your, or someone else's, true beliefs or feelings.

example.ex: I honestly feel I cannot do any more to prove myself...
example.tran: 我的确感到我已经尽全力来证明我自己了。

entry.tran: （强调所说的是事实）真的，确实
entry.def: You use honestly to emphasize that you are telling the truth and that you want people to believe you.

example.ex: Honestly, I don't know anything about it...
example.tran: 真的，我对此事一无所知。

example.ex: We didn't play with him, honestly we didn't.
example.tran: 我们没有耍他，真的没有。

entry.tran: （表示恼怒或不耐烦）天哪，哎呀
entry.def: You use honestly to indicate that you are annoyed or impatient.

example.ex: Honestly, Nev! Must you be quite so crude!...
example.tran: 哎呀，内夫! 你就非得如此粗俗吗！

example.ex: Oh, honestly, I don't know what they will think of next.
example.tran: 噢，天哪，我真不知道他们接下去会想出什么来。

means.word_mean: 1. (used as intensives reflecting the speaker's attitude) it is sincerely the case that;

sentences.sentence: "candidly, I think she doesn't have a conscience"
"frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn"
"in he can't get it honestly, he is willing to steal it"
"was known for dealing aboveboard in everything"

auth_sentence.content: Honestly, you couldn't make this stuff up .
auth_sentence.res_content: Honestly, you couldn't make this stuff up .
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Honestly, you couldn't make this stuff up .

auth_sentence.content: I can honestly answer that I am not suited.
auth_sentence.res_content: I can honestly answer that I am not suited.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I can honestly answer that I am not suited.

auth_sentence.content: But I can honestly say I feel ripped off!
auth_sentence.res_content: But I can honestly say I feel ripped off!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But I can honestly say I feel ripped off!

Sentence.sentence: I honestly don't want to continue the gardening tomorrow, Tony?
Talking honestly "People now have the opportunity of expressing support for Obama every day," says Daniel Effron at Stanford University in California
On the other hand, he says, it may just encourage people to talk more honestly about their feelings regarding race issues, which may not be such a bad thing

sentences.en: I will say I honestly think, even at the risk of offending people.
sentences.cn: 即使有可能冒犯人, 我也要说我真心所想的。
